Description: Fragment of a wheel-made pottery ring-shaped sanctuary lamp, with traces of five inward-facing six wick-holes. Decorated with an orange-brown slip. Fine orange-brown fabric with very fine mica, grey white inclusions <0.5mm.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q369)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (KA.04) (Phase 1)
